subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Josh Howard scored 24 points, Dirk Nowitzki added 19, and the Mavericks embarrassed the Los Angeles Lakers, 108-72, Sunday night to match the longest winning streak in the N.B.A. this season.
snippet: Josh Howard scored 24 points, Dirk Nowitzki added 19, and the Mavericks embarrassed the Los Angeles Lakers, 108-72, Sunday night to match the longest winning streak in the N.B.A. this season.
